wikitext.*:
'''Radhrim''' (Raðrim) was a forested region in eastern [[Doriath]], located between the rivers [[Aros]] and [[Celon]].<ref name=WJBeleriand>{{WJ|Beleriand}}, pp. 183, 189</ref><ref name=LR/> Although what appears to be the same region is also called [[Arthórien]],<ref name=WJBeleriand/> it is unknown if these two regions were the same (or if one was situated within the other). 
==Etymology==

In the [[The Etymologies|''Etymologies'']], the [[Doriathrin]] name ''Radhrim'' is glossed as "East-march".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, pp. 382-3 (entries RAD- and RĪ-)</ref>
